Interface ClientConnection

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
RMIClientConnection
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClientStub, SocketClient
public interface ClientConnection extends Remote
Interface representing any possible Server-side connection to a remote Client actor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Close the connection.
    void
    sendMessage(ClientMessage m)
    Send a ClientMessage to a client according to the underlying network implementation.

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(ClientMessage m) throws IOException
      Send a ClientMessage to a client according to the underlying network implementation.
      Parameters:
      m - ClientMessage Message to be sent.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are any errors during the transfer process.

    • close

      void close() throws RemoteException
      Close the connection.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If the underlying RMI TCP channel is disrupted in any unrecoverable way.
